name: Ahri
title: the Nine-Tailed Fox
shortBio: Innately connected to the magic of the spirit realm, Ahri is a fox-like vastaya who can manipulate her prey's emotions and consume their essence—receiving flashes of their memory and insight from each soul she consumes. Once a powerful yet wayward predator, Ahri is now traveling the world in search of remnants of her ancestors while also trying to replace her stolen memories with ones of her own making.

skins.name: Dynasty Ahri

chromas.name: Dynasty Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

skins.description: Though Ahri's royal blood is obvious in her fashion and poise, she much prefers running across rooftops and causing general mischief to being locked up in a castle. Life's more fun with laughter, don't you think?

skins.name: Midnight Ahri

chromas.name: Midnight Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

skins.description: Deep in the snowy forests bordering the kingdom, villagers tell tales of a mysterious icefox who, under the light of the midnight moon, becomes human. What they don't know is that this fox, Ahri, was once a princess. Cursed to live a life as wild as her heart, she runs through the forests during the day, hoping to find someone to break her eternal curse.

skins.name: Foxfire Ahri

chromas.name: Foxfire Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

chromas.name: Foxfire Ahri

descriptions.description: Obtained through Influencer audience giveaways.

chromas.description: Obtained through Influencer audience giveaways.

skins.description: A young, talented pyromancer from the Shadowfire Temple, Ahri gave up her quiet life when a faction of extremists unleashed the burning horrors of the Ashen Lord. Now she uses her fire magic to fight against them, even though all hope seems lost.

skins.name: Popstar Ahri

chromas.name: Popstar Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

skins.description: Discovered by her record label when she was still a teen, Ahri took the music world by storm when her first five singles hit the Top 100, winning Most Talented New K-pop Artist at the 2013 Pop Shine Awards. She's been stealing hearts and sweeping awards ever since. However, underneath that perfect exterior, Ahri is feeling trapped by increasing demands...

skins.name: Challenger Ahri

chromas.name: Challenger Ahri

descriptions.description: Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 MSI Event.

chromas.description: Loot exclusive gained during the 2019 MSI Event.

chromas.name: Challenger Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

skins.description: Commemorating the 2015 Season 5 start.

skins.name: Academy Ahri

chromas.name: Academy Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

skins.description: NOTICE FROM THE DEAN: Ahri is henceforth suspended from Academy grounds for behavior including (but not limited to): use of her phone during class, use of her phone during disciplinary hearings about her phone, and escaping disciplinary hearings about her phone.

skins.name: Arcade Ahri

chromas.name: Arcade Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

skins.description: Owner of the mysterious six-million-point high score in the infamously difficult beat-em-up Demacia Vice, Ahri is a force of nature on the retro battlefields of Arcadia. Dashing between bosses before ripping them apart with her 8-bit magic, she's already earned the nickname “Queen of the Arcade.”

skins.name: Star Guardian Ahri

chromas.name: Star Guardian Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

skins.description: Ahri is a charismatic team captain who leads her group of Star Guardians from the outer cosmos, with the authority of a queen bee and the sly cunning of a fox. She's effortlessly popular, with an irresistible charm that disarms friends and foes alike.

skins.name: K/DA Ahri

chromas.name: K/DA Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

skins.description: Setting her old bubblegum pop persona aside, Ahri was determined to shake up her image and reinvent herself as an unstoppable force within the music industry. Five years later, she has returned with a sleek new look and a killer sound—and this time she's not alone.

skins.name: Prestige K/DA Ahri
skins.description: Decked out to dazzle, K/DA Ahri charms her audience in a glittering, golden ensemble specially made for her band's 2019 Pop Shine Awards performance. Her Prestige Edition outfit celebrates the golden success of POP/STARS. Can you feel the rush now?

skins.name: Elderwood Ahri

chromas.name: Elderwood Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.name: Elderwood Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

skins.description: Fables of the trickster spirit Ahri have been part of mankind's history for countless generations. Radiant and eternally youthful, she is portrayed as a curious, quizzical member of the Elderwood's feyfolk… though in recent years her heart has hardened, as she fights a growing corruption within her ancestral home.

skins.name: Spirit Blossom Ahri

chromas.name: Spirit Blossom Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.name: Spirit Blossom Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Spirit Blossom event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Spirit Blossom event.

chromas.name: Spirit Blossom Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

skins.description: Some believe the Gatekeeper takes the shape of a fox. Some see other animals—but her role in all tales remains the same. A capricious, whimsical spirit who treats the fates of the living as a game of chase, she offers a path to salvation for souls who seek their final rest… but she will not intervene should they stray.

skins.name: K/DA ALL OUT Ahri

chromas.name: K/DA ALL OUT Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.name: K/DA ALL OUT Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Worlds event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Worlds event.

chromas.name: K/DA ALL OUT Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

skins.description: When Ahri steps onto the stage to perform with K/DA, she knows she's surrounded by the best of the best—different women with different personalities, all at the top of their craft. As their leader and as their friend, Ahri is poised to guide these divas to even greater heights and leave their audiences breathless for more.

skins.name: Coven Ahri

chromas.name: Coven Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.name: Coven Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Coven event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Coven event.

chromas.name: Coven Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released in the 2021 Ahri-versary event.

skins.description: They came to Ahri at the first stirrings of dusk—the laughter of the Half-Light Jackal, ever stalking the world as it turned towards its own inevitable entropy. A vicious predator and powerful witch, Ahri sucks the life from all she lures close, siphoning it towards her lord within the gloom.

skins.name: Prestige K/DA Ahri (2022)
skins.description: Decked out to dazzle, K/DA Ahri charms her audience in a glittering, golden ensemble specially made for her band's 2019 Pop Shine Awards performance. Her Prestige Edition outfit celebrates the golden success of POP/STARS. Can you feel the rush now?

skins.name: Arcana Ahri

chromas.name: Arcana Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description: A trickster and magician whose power is drawn from the grinning moon, Ahri plies her trade rearranging patterns and allowing the Lower World insight into the Higher. Having already set the fated pair Xayah and Rakan careening towards each other, she awaits the resulting chaos with a cynical bemusement.

skins.name: Snow Moon Ahri

chromas.name: Snow Moon Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: An ancient and powerful arctic fox spirit, Ahri has been around since the founding of the Snow Moon order. It is a symbiotic arrangement: agents purify themselves by sacrificing their emotions and memories to her appetite. Ahri is the keeper of their lost memories, experiencing the outside world through her devotees, their eyes now vacant and cold.

skins.name: Risen Legend Ahri

tiers.name: Risen Legend Ahri
tiers.description: You've done well, Ahri, to complete my trials with such grace and humility. To become a Risen Legend is no easy feat, and even in the face of failure, you have proven your resilience. Go forth and leave a legacy worthy of the Unkillable Demon King. When you're ready to learn your true potential… heed my call.

tiers.name: Immortalized Legend Ahri
tiers.description: Ahri, you now rightfully bear the seal of The Unkillable Demon King's chosen. You are an Immortalized Legend, an honor that few have ever achieved. Rest assured that your ancestors are proud of your success, as am I. With this and every battle to come, history will never forget you or the power you've fought tirelessly to earn. Welcome to godhood.

skins.description: You've done well, Ahri, to complete my trials with such grace and humility. To become a Risen Legend is no easy feat, and even in the face of failure, you have proven your resilience. Go forth and leave a legacy worthy of the Unkillable Demon King. When you're ready to learn your true potential… heed my call.

skins.name: Spirit Blossom Springs Ahri

chromas.name: Spirit Blossom Springs Ahri

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

skins.description: Owner and proprietor of the Spirit Blossom Springs bathhouse, Ahri has turned her favorite mountain into a hidden oasis. Wielding a keen understanding of the power of rest, she indulges her appetite for life's richest flavors—one memory at a time. Only one with a sharp yet kindhearted wit could handle her guests' spirited dispositions.

skins.name: After Hours Spirit Blossom Springs Ahri
skins.description: Sunlight turns the magical steam of Spirit Blossom Springs into a warm, inviting embrace—but moonlight stirs the steam into an exhilarating flurry of energy. During evening hours, Ahri sets the mood by showing off her wry and fun-loving side, encouraging guests to abandon their egos and let loose. One night away from life's obligations won't hurt anyone.

passive.name: Essence Theft
passive.description:
After killing 9 minions or monsters, Ahri heals.
After taking down an enemy champion, Ahri heals for a greater amount.

spells.name: Orb of Deception
spells.description: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back.
spells.dynamicDescription: Ahri throws then pulls back her orb, dealing <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage> on the way out and <trueDamage>@TotalDamage@ true damage</trueDamage> on the way back.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Fox-Fire
spells.description: Ahri gains a brief burst of Move Speed and releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
spells.dynamicDescription: Ahri releases 3 fox-fires that seek nearby enemies and deal <magicDamage>@SingleFireDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>, reduced to <magicDamage>@MultiFireDamage@ damage</magicDamage> beyond the first. She also gains <speed>@MovementSpeed*100@% Move Speed</speed> decaying over @MovementSpeedDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Charm
spells.description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, instantly stopping movement abilities and causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.
spells.dynamicDescription: Ahri blows a kiss that <status>Charms</status> the first enemy hit for @CharmDuration@ seconds and deals <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Spirit Rush
spells.description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown, and gains additional recasts when taking down enemy champions.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Ahri nimbly dashes, firing @RMaxTargetsPerCast@ essence bolts at nearby enemies, prioritizing champions. These bolts deal @RCalculatedDamage@ magic damage each. Spirit Rush can be Recast up to 2 more times within @RRecastWindow@ seconds.

Consuming a champion's Essence with Essence Theft during this period extends the recast window by up to @PDurationExtension@ seconds and grants an additional recast of Spirit Rush (up to @RMaxCasts@ stored).@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
